pr_title: Added regex support to the `split` expression

timeline.bodyText: Line endings for history / viewing the changes properly 😃

replies.bodyText: I don't know why but this is always an issue
replies.author: DeltaRays

replies.bodyText: Because line endings are not consistent in Skript's files : some are LF and some are CRLF, it's quite random
replies.author: Matocolotoe

timeline.bodyText: To avoid having a long line, could you split this up over a few lines?
timeline.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.bodyText: Spaces before and after static declaration (this is just the way the file was, but if you're going in to edit, you can probably get this too - if not, no worries!)
